data.title: film by Shyamalan [2021]
data.meta_description: Other articles where Old is discussed: M. Night Shyamalan: …the second Unbreakable sequel, and Old (2021). In Knock at the Cabin (2023), a vacationing family is told that one of them must be sacrificed to avert an impending apocalypse. In addition, Shyamalan served as an executive producer of the television series Servant (2019– ) and directed four episodes.
data.text:
In M. Night Shyamalan

…the second Unbreakable sequel, and Old (2021). In Knock at the Cabin (2023), a vacationing family is told that one of them must be sacrificed to avert an impending apocalypse. In addition, Shyamalan served as an executive producer of the television series Servant (2019– ) and directed four episodes.

Read More

In Gael García Bernal

Night Shyamalan’s Old (2021), the actor portrayed a vacationer at a secluded beach where visitors age quickly. Also in 2021 García Bernal starred as Zorro in Z.
